1.  Name of Project: - Gurucul Risk Analytics(GRA):-
Gurucul Risk Analytics is built upon our core PIBAE architecture (Predictive Identity
Based Behavior Anomaly Engine). PIBAE identifies anomalous behaviors across users,
accounts, applications, and devices by leveraging behavior analytics, machine learning, and
peer group modeling. big data enabled approach provides organizations’  with risk based
compliance, continuous access governance and protection from under-the-radar cyber
campaigns and sophisticated insider activity like IP Theft, Data Exfiltration and Privilege
Access Abuse. Gurucul provides a Hybrid Behavior Analytics (HBA) architecture with the
breadth of Identity Analytics to User & Entity Behavior Analytics, and the depth from cloud
apps to on-premises behavior.
